mapper.select: SELECT S.INPUT_NAME , S.INPUT_SCHOOL , S.INPUT_ID , S.INPUT_MAJOR , S.USER_PW , S.LEVEL , S.REG_DATE , S.FULL_NAME , S.ORIGINAL_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.INPUT_NAME , A.INPUT_SCHOOL , A.INPUT_ID , A.INPUT_MAJOR , A.USER_PW , A.LEVEL , A.REG_DATE , B.FULL_NAME , B.ORIGINAL_NAME FROM MEMBER A JOIN USER_ADD_FILE B ON A.NO = B.NO ) s WHERE S.INPUT_ID = #{value }
